title: Develop your programming skills with this Python bundle, now under $25 during Deal Days
content:
Macworld

Python is the world’s most popular programming language due to its general-purpose nature and scalability. It’s also one of the easiest languages to learn, and if you want to open new career paths or move up in your current role, harnessing this skill may be crucial.

Fortunately, you don’t need to look further than here for a comprehensive Python programming education. During our version of Prime Day, Deal Days, this Python bundle is only $23.97 (reg. $120) with no coupon necessary.

This extensive bundle includes ten courses from some of the web’s top instructors, including Juan Galvan (4.5-star instructor rating), Edouard Renard (4.6-star rating), and Joe Rahl (4.6/5-star rating). Just hop on your Mac, and you can start with the absolute basics, like learning to write basic code with Python.

Then, you can delve into more complicated subject matters like ZERO to GUI programming, other advanced-level Python programming, and more. Eventually, you’ll work towards projects like an automatic stock trader and real-time stream processing.

Gain an immersive Python education with these courses.

During Deal Days, get The Premium Python Programming Certification Bundle for just $23.97. No coupon is required, but this deal ends October 15th at 11:59pm Pacific!

 

The Premium Python Programming Certification Bundle – $23.97
